decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: Design and access statement, Fire strategy statement, unspecified location plan. Received 17/05/2024
N/03(rev.A), N/04(rev.A), N/05(rev.A), N/06(rev.A), N/07(rev.A), N/08A(rev.A), N/09A(rev.A), N/09A(rev.A), N/10A(rev.A), N/11A(rev.A), N/12A(rev.A). Received: 25/07/2024

Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the [insert] elevation of the development hereby permitted.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary to the enjoyment of the house at 117 Ringway, Southall, Hounslow, UB2 5ST described at the top of this decision letter and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions and the character of the area.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension and part single storey rear extension to the house.
